prompt: Design a Contact Us page with light grey background and clean professional look. Include a centered 'Contact Us' title in deep red with bold font size 32. Add a grey subtitle encouraging users to reach out. Display three contact methods (phone, email, address) in vertically stacked white cards with elevation 4, rounded corners, and deep red icons positioned above the text. Include a contact form with Name, Email, Subject, and Message fields using outlined text fields with deep red borders. Add a full-width deep red 'Submit' button with proper spacing.
